name: Codeforces Rating
description: Competitive programming rating system evaluating algorithm design, implementation, and debugging on timed programming contests.

metrics.name: elo_rating
metrics.definition: Elo-based rating calculated from contest performance (problem-solving accuracy and speed)
metrics.calculation: Standard Codeforces rating algorithm based on relative ranking

test_method: Simulate contest participation: present problems with time constraints, evaluate submitted code on hidden test cases. Rating computed from successful submissions and contest rankings.
notes: Rating reflects competitive programming skill including algorithms, data structures, and implementation under time pressure. Document whether model had access to external tools, libraries, or repeated attempts.
